description:
A strange four-year-old boy named Kotarou moves into Shimizu Apartment all on his own. He doesn`t seem to have any parents or family around.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Kotarou de Soro / Sentou Mode / Ninchi Soudou / Asagaeri no Onna ni / Furui E no Mangaka / Uso ka Makoto ka?
コタローで候 / せんとうモード / 認知騒動 / 朝帰りのオンナに / 古い絵の漫画家 / 噓か誠か?
